languages.text: "Преимущество Цикла — предсказуемость. Сойдя с него, коллектив вступит в опасное пространство неопределенности, что неизбежно приведет к катастрофам и риску всеобщей гибели. Учение о прерывании Цикла может быть благовещением, а может — приговором. Лишь Омниссия знает все и постиг все. Иные же — лишь пророки, трактующие его мудрость в меру своего Понимания".

"The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and the risk of universal annihilation. The doctrine of Discontinuing the Cycle may herald good things to come — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all, and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension permits."
languages.original_text: "Преимущество Цикла — предсказуемость. Сойдя с него, коллектив вступит в опасное пространство неопределенности, что неизбежно приведет к катастрофам и риску всеобщей гибели. Учение о прерывании Цикла может быть благовещением, а может — приговором. Лишь Омниссия знает все и постиг все. Иные же — лишь пророки, трактующие его мудрость в меру своего Понимания".

traits.locale_text: "The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and a risk of downfall for all. The doctrine of discontinuing the Cycle may be good tidings — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension enables them to."

"The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and a risk of downfall for all. The doctrine of discontinuing the Cycle may be good tidings — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension enables them to."

Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension permits."

languages.text: 「円環には予測可能性という利点がある。それを放棄することは、集合体を不確実で危険な場所へ陥れることになろう。それはつまり必然的に、災害を引き起こし、人類滅亡の危機につながる。円環を断ち切るというドクトリンは良い知らせかもしれないが、同時に死刑の宣告かもしれん。万機神のみが全てを知り、また理解している。その他の者は自身の能力の範囲でその智慧を解釈する預言者にすぎない」
languages.original_text: "The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and the risk of universal annihilation. The doctrine of discontinuing the Cycle may herald good things to come — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all, and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension permits."

traits.locale_text: 「円環には予測可能性という利点がある。それを放棄するということは、集合体を不確実性の危険な場所へ陥れることになろう。そしてそれはつまり必然的に、我々全てにとって災害や破滅のリスクにつながるだろう。円環を中断するというドクトリンは良い知らせかもしれないが、あるいは死刑の宣告かもしれん。万機神のみが全てを知り、また理解している。その他の者はその者の能力の範囲でその智慧を解釈する預言者にすぎない」

languages.text: “循环拥有可以预测的优势。若是结束循环，可能会将所有人丢入危险的不确定性之中。这样的结果必将会带来灾难，还会带来巨大的风险，可能会导致整个宇宙毁灭。终止循环的学说可能代表着进步，也可能代表着灭亡。只有欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。至于剩下的人，不过只是祂的先知而已，尽他们所能努力阐释祂的智慧。”
languages.original_text: "The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and the risk of universal annihilation. The doctrine of discontinuing the Cycle may herald good things to come — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all, and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension permits."

traits.locale_text: “循环拥有可以预测的优势。若是结束循环，可能会将所有人丢入危险的不确定性之中。这样的结果必将会带来灾难，还会带来巨大的风险，可能会导致所有人覆灭。终止循环的学说可能代表着进步，也可能代表着灭亡。只有欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。至于剩下的人，不过只是祂的先知而已，尽他们所能努力阐释祂的智慧。”

languages.text: "Der Zyklus hat den Vorteil der Berechenbarkeit. Ihn zu verlassen, stürzt das Kollektiv in eine gefährliche Unsicherheit, die unvermeidbar zu Katastrophen führt und das Risiko universeller Auslöschung mit sich bringt. Die Doktrin, den Zyklus zu unterbrechen, kann ein gutes Omen sind – oder sie ist eine Todesstrafe. Nur der Omnissiah weiß alles und begreift alles. Alle anderen sind nur Propheten, die Seine Weisheit deuten, und zwar insoweit, als ihr eigenes Verständnis es zulässt."
languages.original_text: "The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and the risk of universal annihilation. The doctrine of discontinuing the Cycle may herald good things to come — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all, and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension permits."

traits.locale_text: "Der Zyklus hat den Vorteil der Berechenbarkeit. Ihn zu verlassen, stürzt das Kollektiv in eine gefährliche Unsicherheit, die unvermeidbar zu Katastrophen führt und den Untergang für alle bedeuten kann. Die Doktrin, den Zyklus zu unterbrechen, mag Gutes mit sich bringen – oder sie ist eine Todesstrafe. Nur der Omnissiah weiß alles und begreift alles. Alle anderen sind nur Propheten, die Seine Weisheit deuten, und zwar in dem Rahmen, den ihr eigenes Verständnis ermöglicht."

languages.text: « Le cycle a l'avantage d'être prévisible. Son abandon plongera la collectivité dans un périlleux espace d'incertitude propre à faire le lit d'un désastre au risque de précipiter l'annihilation totale de notre civilisation. La doctrine de l'interruption peut tout aussi bien être une bonne nouvelle qu'une condamnation à mort. Seul l'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. Les autres ne sont que d'humbles prophètes qui interprètent Sa sagesse à la lumière ténue de leur propre compréhension. »
languages.original_text: "The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and the risk of universal annihilation. The doctrine of Discontinuing the Cycle may herald good things to come — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all, and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension permits."

traits.locale_text: « Le cycle a l'avantage d'être prévisible. Son abandon plongera la collectivité dans un périlleux espace d'incertitude propre à faire le lit d'un désastre au risque de précipiter la perte de l'ensemble de notre civilisation. La doctrine de l'interruption peut tout aussi bien être une bonne nouvelle qu'une condamnation à mort. Seul l'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. Les autres ne sont que d'humbles prophètes qui interprètent Sa sagesse à la lumière ténue de leur propre compréhension. »

languages.text: «El Ciclo posee la ventaja de la previsibilidad. Abandonarlo sumiría al colectivo en un peligroso espacio de incertidumbre que conduciría inevitablemente a desastres y a una potencial aniquilación universal. La doctrina de interrumpir el Ciclo podría augurar la llegada de cosas buenas, o quizá ser una sentencia de muerte. Solo el Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo. Otros son meros profetas que interpretan Su sabiduría en la medida que se lo permite su propia Comprensión».
languages.original_text: "The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and the risk of universal annihilation. The doctrine of Discontinuing the Cycle may herald good things to come — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all, and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension permits."

traits.locale_text: «El Ciclo posee la ventaja de la previsibilidad. Abandonarlo sumiría al colectivo en un peligroso espacio de incertidumbre que conduciría inevitablemente a desastres y a un potencial declive para todos. La doctrina de interrumpir el Ciclo podría ser positiva, o quizá una sentencia de muerte. Solo el Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo. Otros son meros profetas que interpretan Su sabiduría en la medida que se lo permite su propia Comprensión».

languages.text: "Döngü'nün öngörülebilme avantajı vardır. Onu terk etmek, bütünlüğü bilinmezliğin tehlikeli alanına atar. Bu da kaçınılmaz olarak felaketlere yol açacak, evrensel yok oluş riskini beraberinde getirecektir. Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu öğretisi, yaşanacak iyi şeylerin habercisi olabileceği gibi ölüm fermanı anlamına da gelebilir. Yalnızca Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır. Diğerleri, sahip oldukları İdrak olanak tanıdığı ölçüde O'nun bilgeliğini yorumlayan elçilerden ibarettirler."
languages.original_text: "The Cycle has the advantage of predictability. Abandoning it will plunge the collective into a perilous space of uncertainty, which will inevitably lead to disasters and the risk of universal annihilation. The doctrine of Discontinuing the Cycle may herald good things to come — or it may be a death sentence. Only the Omnissiah knows all, and comprehends all. Others are mere prophets who interpret His wisdom as far as their own Comprehension permits."

traits.locale_text: "Döngü'nün öngörülebilme avantajı vardır. Onu terk etmek, toplumu bilinmezliğin tehlikeli alanına atmak demektir; bu da kaçınılmaz olarak felaketlere yol açacak, evrensel yok oluş riskini beraberinde getirecektir. Döngü'nün süreğini bozma doktrini, yaşanacak iyi şeylerin habercisi olabilir, tıpkı ölüm fermanı anlamına gelebileceği gibi. Yalnızca Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır. Diğerleri, sahip oldukları İdrak olanak tanıdığı ölçüde O'nun bilgeliğini yorumlayan kâhinlerden başka bir şey değildir."

"Döngü'nün öngörülebilme avantajı vardır. Onu terk etmek, toplumu bilinmezliğin tehlikeli alanına atmak demektir; bu da kaçınılmaz olarak felaketlere yol açacak, evrensel yok oluş riskini beraberinde getirecektir. Döngü'nün süreğini bozma doktrini, yaşanacak iyi şeylerin habercisi olabilir, tıpkı ölüm fermanı anlamına gelebileceği gibi. Yalnızca Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır. Diğerleri, sahip oldukları İdrak olanak tanıdığı ölçüde O'nun bilgeliğini yorumlayan kâhinlerden başka bir şey değildir."
